text: Tap okok mɨdupsek kɨli gɨpal ak, binɨb okok chɨnop nɨgɨlaŋ agɨl gɨpal agak. Kɨli binɨb okok chɨnop nɨgɨlaŋ agɨl, God takaw ak mɨj kɨl tɨkɨl tap mɨgan lɨl, ogɨnap ñɨn ajɨp kopen sek lɨl, ogɨnap kɨmɨg cheg alaŋ lɨl gɨpal agak. Pen kɨli chɨnop nɨgɨlaŋ agɨl, chech palawl nag day wul sek tep okok lɨpal agak.
